mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, password, nickname, role, status, points) VALUES ( #{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{role, typeHandler=world.ssafy.tourtalk.model.typehandler.GenericEnumTypeHandler, javaType=world.ssafy.tourtalk.model.dto.enums.Role}, #{status, typeHandler=world.ssafy.tourtalk.model.typehandler.GenericEnumTypeHandler, javaType=world.ssafy.tourtalk.model.dto.enums.MemberStatus}, #{points})
